thread.title: Re: Call off the investigation! Debra Messing knows who was REALLY behind Berkeley violence

author: 'Tom Crawford
title: Re: Call off the investigation! Debra Messing knows who was REALLY behind Berkeley violence
text:
Call off the investigation! Debra Messing knows who was REALLY behind Berkeley violence Posted at 12:56 pm on February 4, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Former Bill Clinton Labor Secretary Robert Reich said on CNN Thursday night that he‚Äôd heard ‚Äúrumors‚Äù that those who were really at fault for the violent Berkeley riot were ‚Äúright-wingers,‚Äù and Reich ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt bet against it.‚Äù Actress Debra Messing concurs: Horrible. The protest was peaceful until the masked agitators came and attacked the peaceful protesters. I assume Alt- Right supporters https://t.co/P7iHZyLWFz 
‚Äî Debra Messing (@DebraMessing) February 4, 2017 
It‚Äôs worth pointing out that Messing‚Äôs comment is based on a tweet using a photo that doesn‚Äôt appear to have been taken in Berkeley, or even in the U.S.: 
‚Äî becky smith üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà (@beckys04) February 4, 2017 @DebraMessing This is fake. It was originally taken in Greece during violent protests.Look here: 20th picture https://t.co/vazX4DjInn 
‚Äî Sebastian Degenhardt (@kontrauvente) February 4, 2017 @DebraMessing The Flag on the man's jacket was added to blame anti-fascists. It says "Antifaschistische Aktion". https://t.co/cN5SRVaXpU 
‚Äî Sebastian Degenhardt (@kontrauvente) February 4, 2017 Trending
